original_title: นางสิงห์แก้มแดง
overview: Witaya (Sorapong Chatree) is responsible of the security inside Pa's company. Pa has two daughters, Plaew and Fai. They rob their father's money from a safe and donate (บริจาค) 500 000 baht to a blind pupil school. The two sisters give the money under the father's name (กุศล)! While stealing the money, they wear masks with red cheeks (แก้มแดง). They sign their crime with a name card displaying a lioness logo (นางสิงห์).
title: Tenacious Lionesses
